Symbol.Script_3D:
pen gs_sc_pen
!********* abstract 3D
if GLOB_CONTEXT <> 4 & not(GLOB_PREVIEW_MODE = 2) then if det_3 = "Abstrakt" then scale3=100 goto 1001 endif endif
!********* section, elevation
if GLOB_CONTEXT = 4 | (GLOB_PREVIEW_MODE = 2) then if det_sa = 100 then goto 1000 if det_sa = 50 then goto 1000 if det_sa = 20 then goto 1 endif
1:
!****************************************** Bedeckung
lb_b=(a+0.02+2*(a+0.02)/3)-0.02
if bedec=1 then
if iLayoutType = LAYOUT_LEFT_TOP or iLayoutType = LAYOUT_LEFT_BOT then mulx -1
material matsc
bed_bet=(ras_s+0.04)*tan(15)
lb_b=(a+0.02+2*(a+0.02)/3)-0.02 bet_brei=0.04+3*ras_s/2+sc/2+0.02
sc_tk=0.005 !!!schiene thickness bed_ob=0.05 bed_unt=vsh+sc+0.03
addy b+bed_unt+bed_bet+bed_ob addx -lb/2 addz -0.02 roty 90
prism_ 9, lb_b, 0,0,15, -sc_tk,0,15, -sc_tk,-bed_ob,15, -sc_tk-bet_brei,-bed_ob-bed_bet,15, -sc_tk-bet_brei,-bed_ob-bed_bet-bed_unt,15, -bet_brei,-bed_ob-bed_bet-bed_unt,15, -bet_brei,-bed_ob-bed_bet-sc_tk*tan(30),15, 0,-bed_ob-sc_tk*tan(30), 15, 0,0,-1
del 4
if iLayoutType = LAYOUT_LEFT_TOP or iLayoutType = LAYOUT_LEFT_BOT then del 1
endif
!****************************************** type, offnung
if iLayoutType = LAYOUT_RIGHT_TOP then
gosub 601
addx ((a+0.02)-(a+0.08)/3)*(offladen/100)
if loc_type=4 then gosub 10 if loc_type=1 then gosub 20 if loc_type=3 then gosub 30 if loc_type=2 then gosub 40 if loc_type=5 then gosub 50
del 1
addx ((2*(a+0.02)/3)-(a+0.08)/3)*(offladen/100) addz ras_s+0.02
if loc_type=4 then gosub 10 if loc_type=1 then gosub 20 if loc_type=3 then gosub 30 if loc_type=2 then gosub 40 if loc_type=5 then gosub 50
del 2
addx -((2*(a+0.02)/3)-(a+0.08)/3)*(offladen/100) addz ras_s+0.02
addx lb_b/2-lb/2 mulx -1 addx -(lb_b/2-lb/2)
if loc_type=4 then gosub 10 if loc_type=1 then gosub 20 if loc_type=3 then gosub 30 if loc_type=2 then gosub 40 if loc_type=5 then gosub 50
del 3
del 2
endif
if iLayoutType = LAYOUT_RIGHT_BOT then
gosub 602
addx ((a+0.02)-(a+0.08)/3)*(offladen/100) addz ras_s+0.02
if loc_type=4 then gosub 10 if loc_type=1 then gosub 20 if loc_type=3 then gosub 30 if loc_type=2 then gosub 40 if loc_type=5 then gosub 50
del 2
addx ((2*(a+0.02)/3)-(a+0.08)/3)*(offladen/100)
if loc_type=4 then gosub 10 if loc_type=1 then gosub 20 if loc_type=3 then gosub 30 if loc_type=2 then gosub 40 if loc_type=5 then gosub 50
del 1
addx -((2*(a+0.02)/3)-(a+0.08)/3)*(offladen/100)
addx lb_b/2-lb/2 mulx -1 addx -(lb_b/2-lb/2)
if loc_type=4 then gosub 10 if loc_type=1 then gosub 20 if loc_type=3 then gosub 30 if loc_type=2 then gosub 40 if loc_type=5 then gosub 50
del 3
del 1
endif
if iLayoutType = LAYOUT_LEFT_TOP then
mulx -1
gosub 601
addx ((a+0.02)-(a+0.08)/3)*(offladen/100)
if loc_type=4 then gosub 10 if loc_type=1 then gosub 20 if loc_type=3 then gosub 30 if loc_type=2 then gosub 40 if loc_type=5 then gosub 50
del 1
addx ((2*(a+0.02)/3)-(a+0.08)/3)*(offladen/100) addz ras_s+0.02
if loc_type=4 then gosub 10 if loc_type=1 then gosub 20 if loc_type=3 then gosub 30 if loc_type=2 then gosub 40 if loc_type=5 then gosub 50
del 2
addx -((2*(a+0.02)/3)-(a+0.08)/3)*(offladen/100) addz ras_s+0.02
addx lb_b/2-lb/2 mulx -1 addx -(lb_b/2-lb/2)
if loc_type=4 then gosub 10 if loc_type=1 then gosub 20 if loc_type=3 then gosub 30 if loc_type=2 then gosub 40 if loc_type=5 then gosub 50
del 3
del 2
endif
if iLayoutType = LAYOUT_LEFT_BOT then
mulx -1
gosub 602
addx ((2*(a+0.02)/3)-(a+0.08)/3)*(offladen/100)
if loc_type=4 then gosub 10 if loc_type=1 then gosub 20 if loc_type=3 then gosub 30 if loc_type=2 then gosub 40 if loc_type=5 then gosub 50
del 1
addx ((a+0.02)-(a+0.08)/3)*(offladen/100) addz ras_s+0.02
if loc_type=4 then gosub 10 if loc_type=1 then gosub 20 if loc_type=3 then gosub 30 if loc_type=2 then gosub 40 if loc_type=5 then gosub 50
del 2
addx -((2*(a+0.02)/3)-(a+0.08)/3)*(offladen/100)
addx lb_b/2-lb/2 mulx -1 addx -(lb_b/2-lb/2)
if loc_type=4 then gosub 10 if loc_type=1 then gosub 20 if loc_type=3 then gosub 30 if loc_type=2 then gosub 40 if loc_type=5 then gosub 50
del 3
del 1
del 1
endif
end
!****************************************** Schiebeladen "mono"
10:
!****************************************** type Gelocht
material mats
gps=0.003 !!!gelocht starke
!******************** Rahmen
addz gps
prism_ 5, ras_s-gps, -lb/2, 0, 10, -lb/2+rab_s, rab_s, 15, -lb/2+rab_s, b-rab_s, 10, -lb/2, b, 15, -lb/2, 0, -1
prism_ 5, ras_s-gps, lb/2, 0, 10, lb/2-rab_s, rab_s, 15, lb/2-rab_s, b-rab_s, 10, lb/2, b, 15, lb/2, 0, -1
gosub 100
prism_ 5, ras_s-gps, -lb/2, 0, 10, -lb/2+rab_s, rab_s, 15, lb/2-rab_s, rab_s, 10, lb/2, 0, 15, -lb/2, 0, -1
prism_ 5, ras_s-gps, -lb/2, b, 10, -lb/2+rab_s, b-rab_s, 15, lb/2-rab_s, b-rab_s, 10, lb/2, b, 15, -lb/2, b, -1
del 1
gosub 200
gosub 500
!******************** Laden
material matl
!mm=14 !!! vertikal !nn=14 !!! horizontal !r=0.03 !!! hole radius
r=rsc
a1=lb-2*rab_s b1=b-2*rab_s
!res=4 dalph=360/res
dx=(a1-(nnsc*2*r))/(nnsc+1) dy=(b1-(mmsc*2*r))/(mmsc+1)
alph=0
dyy=0
for ii=1 to mmsc
for j=1 to nnsc
for i=1 to res+1
put -a1/2+r*cos(alph)+dx+r+dxx, r*sin(alph)+r+dy+rab_s+dyy, 79
if i=res+1 then put -a1/2+r*cos(alph)+dx+r+dxx, r*sin(alph)+r+dy+rab_s+dyy, -1
alph=alph+dalph
next i
dxx=(dx+2*r)*j
next j
dxx=0 dyy=(dy+2*r)*ii
next ii
prism_ 5+nsp/3, gps, -lb/2, 0, 15, -lb/2, b, 5, lb/2, b, 15, lb/2, 0, 15, -lb/2, 0, -1,
get (nsp)
return
20:
!****************************************** type Lamellen_fest
material mats
!******************** Rahmen
prism_ 5, ras_s, -lb/2, 0, 15, -lb/2+rab_s, 0, 15, -lb/2+rab_s, b-rab_s, 15, -lb/2, b-rab_s, 15, -lb/2, 0, -1
prism_ 5, ras_s, lb/2, 0, 15, lb/2-rab_s, 0, 15, lb/2-rab_s, b-rab_s, 15, lb/2, b-rab_s, 15, lb/2, 0, -1
gosub 100
prism_ 5, ras_s, -lb/2+rab_s, 0, 15, -lb/2+rab_s, rabu_s, 15, lb/2-rab_s, rabu_s, 15, lb/2-rab_s, 0, 15, -lb/2+rab_s, 0, -1
prism_ 5, ras_s, -lb/2, b, 15, -lb/2, b-rab_s, 15, lb/2, b-rab_s, 15, lb/2, b, 15, -lb/2, b, -1
gosub 200
gosub 500
!******************** Laden
material matl
las_s=ras_s/3 b1=b-rab_s-rabu_s
!hlb=0.08
nn=int(b1/hlb) if (nn+1)-b1/hlb<0.5 then nn=nn+1 hlb=b1/nn
for i=1 to nn
addy b-rab_s roty -90 addz-(lb-2*rab_s)/2
prism_ 5, lb-2*rab_s, 0,0,15, las_s,0,15, ras_s,-hlb,15, ras_s-las_s,-hlb,15, 0,0,-1
del 3
addy -hlb
next i
del nn
return
30:
!****************************************** type Rahmen
material mats
!******************** Rahmen
rabuo_s=0.008 !***breite unter rabuu_s=rabu_s-rabuo_s pas_s=ras_s/3 !***panel breite pab=0.01 !***panel anlagern
prism_ 5, ras_s, -lb/2, 0, 15, -lb/2+rab_s, 0, 15, -lb/2+rab_s, b-rab_s, 15, -lb/2, b-rab_s, 15, -lb/2, 0, -1
prism_ 5, ras_s, lb/2, 0, 15, lb/2-rab_s, 0, 15, lb/2-rab_s, b-rab_s, 15, lb/2, b-rab_s, 15, lb/2, 0, -1
gosub 100
prism_ 5, ras_s, -lb/2+rab_s, 0, 15, -lb/2+rab_s, rabuu_s, 15, lb/2-rab_s, rabuu_s, 15, lb/2-rab_s, 0, 15, -lb/2+rab_s, 0, -1
addy rabuu_s roty 90 addz-(lb-2*rab_s)/2 addx -ras_s/2
prism_ 5, lb-2*rab_s, -ras_s/2, 0, 15, -pas_s/2, rabuo_s, 15, pas_s/2, rabuo_s, 15, ras_s/2, 0, 15, -ras_s/2, 0, -1
del 4
prism_ 5, ras_s, -lb/2, b, 15, -lb/2, b-rab_s, 15, lb/2, b-rab_s, 15, lb/2, b, 15, -lb/2, b, -1
gosub 200
gosub 500
!******************** Laden
material matl
addz ras_s/2-pas_s/2
prism_ 5, pas_s, -lb/2+rab_s-pab, rabu_s, 15, -lb/2+rab_s-pab, b-rab_s+pab, 15, lb/2-rab_s+pab, b-rab_s+pab, 15, lb/2-rab_s+pab, rabu_s, 15, -lb/2+rab_s-pab, rabu_s, -1
del 1
return
40:
!****************************************** type Lamellen_beweglich
material mats
!******************** Rahmen
prism_ 5, ras_s, -lb/2, 0, 10, -lb/2+rab_s, rab_s, 15, -lb/2+rab_s, b-rab_s, 10, -lb/2, b, 15, -lb/2, 0, -1
prism_ 5, ras_s, lb/2, 0, 10, lb/2-rab_s, rab_s, 15, lb/2-rab_s, b-rab_s, 10, lb/2, b, 15, lb/2, 0, -1
gosub 100
prism_ 5, ras_s, -lb/2, 0, 10, -lb/2+rab_s, rab_s, 15, lb/2-rab_s, rab_s, 10, lb/2, 0, 15, -lb/2, 0, -1
prism_ 5, ras_s, -lb/2, b, 10, -lb/2+rab_s, b-rab_s, 15, lb/2-rab_s, b-rab_s, 10, lb/2, b, 15, -lb/2, b, -1
gosub 200
gosub 500
!******************** Laden
material matl
lab_s=ras_s/6 b1=b-2*rab_s
!hlb=0.1
nn=int(b1/hlb) if (nn+1)-b1/hlb<0.5 then nn=nn+1 hlb=b1/nn
for i=1 to nn
addy b-(rab_s+hlb/2) addz ras_s-1.5*lab_s
rotx -alpha
addy -(b-(rab_s+hlb/2)) addz -(ras_s-1.5*lab_s)
addy b-rab_s roty -90 addz-(lb-2*rab_s)/2
prism_ 9, lb-2*rab_s, ras_s-lab_s,0,15, ras_s-2*lab_s,0,15, ras_s-2*lab_s+2*lab_s/3,-hlb/3,13, ras_s-2*lab_s+3*lab_s/3,-2*hlb/3,13, ras_s-lab_s,-hlb,15, ras_s,-hlb,15, ras_s,-2*hlb/3,13, ras_s-lab_s/3,-hlb/3,13, ras_s-lab_s,0,-1
del 3
del 5
addy -hlb
next i
del nn
return
50:
!****************************************** type Vollflachig
!******************** Rahmen
material mats
prism_ 5, ras_s, -lb/2, 0, 15, -lb/2, b, 15, lb/2, b, 15, lb/2, 0, 15, -lb/2, 0, -1
gosub 500
return
500:
!****************************************** Schiene vertikal
material matsc
vsv=vsh+sc_tk !!!schiene vertikal hight
for i=1 to 2
addy b addx -lb/2+rab_s+0.05 addz (ras_s-vsc)/2
prism_ 5, vsc, -vsc/2,0, 15, -vsc/2,vsv, 15, vsc/2,vsv, 15, vsc/2,0, 15, -vsc/2,0, -1
del 3
mulx -1
next i
del 2
return
601:
!****************************************** Schiene horizontal oben (r)
material matsc
lb_sc=a+0.02 !!!schiene length sc_tk=0.005 !!!schiene thickness
addy b+vsh addx -lb/2 addz ras_s/2 roty 90
prism_ 13, lb_sc, -sc/2,0, 15, -sc/2,sc, 15, sc/2,sc, 15, sc/2,0, 15, vsc/2,0, 15, vsc/2,sc_tk, 15, sc/2-sc_tk,sc_tk, 15, sc/2-sc_tk,sc-sc_tk, 15, -sc/2+sc_tk,sc-sc_tk, 15, -sc/2+sc_tk,sc_tk, 15, -vsc/2,sc_tk, 15, -vsc/2,0, 15, -sc/2,0, -1
del 4
lb_sc=2*(a+0.02)/3 !!!schiene length
addy b+vsh addx -lb/2 addz ras_s/2+ras_s+0.02 roty 90
prism_ 13, lb_sc, -sc/2,0, 15, -sc/2,sc, 15, sc/2,sc, 15, sc/2,0, 15, vsc/2,0, 15, vsc/2,sc_tk, 15, sc/2-sc_tk,sc_tk, 15, sc/2-sc_tk,sc-sc_tk, 15, -sc/2+sc_tk,sc-sc_tk, 15, -sc/2+sc_tk,sc_tk, 15, -vsc/2,sc_tk, 15, -vsc/2,0, 15, -sc/2,0, -1
del 4
lb_sc=2*(a+0.02)/3 !!!schiene length
addy b+vsh addx -lb/2+lb_b-lb_sc addz ras_s/2+ras_s+0.02 roty 90
prism_ 13, lb_sc, -sc/2,0, 15, -sc/2,sc, 15, sc/2,sc, 15, sc/2,0, 15, vsc/2,0, 15, vsc/2,sc_tk, 15, sc/2-sc_tk,sc_tk, 15, sc/2-sc_tk,sc-sc_tk, 15, -sc/2+sc_tk,sc-sc_tk, 15, -sc/2+sc_tk,sc_tk, 15, -vsc/2,sc_tk, 15, -vsc/2,0, 15, -sc/2,0, -1
del 4
return
602:
!****************************************** Schiene horizontal unter (r)
material matsc
lb_sc=a+0.02 !!!schiene length sc_tk=0.005 !!!schiene thickness
addy b+vsh addx -lb/2 addz ras_s/2+ras_s+0.02 roty 90
prism_ 13, lb_sc, -sc/2,0, 15, -sc/2,sc, 15, sc/2,sc, 15, sc/2,0, 15, vsc/2,0, 15, vsc/2,sc_tk, 15, sc/2-sc_tk,sc_tk, 15, sc/2-sc_tk,sc-sc_tk, 15, -sc/2+sc_tk,sc-sc_tk, 15, -sc/2+sc_tk,sc_tk, 15, -vsc/2,sc_tk, 15, -vsc/2,0, 15, -sc/2,0, -1
del 4
lb_sc=2*(a+0.02)/3 !!!schiene length
addy b+vsh addx -lb/2 addz ras_s/2 roty 90
prism_ 13, lb_sc, -sc/2,0, 15, -sc/2,sc, 15, sc/2,sc, 15, sc/2,0, 15, vsc/2,0, 15, vsc/2,sc_tk, 15, sc/2-sc_tk,sc_tk, 15, sc/2-sc_tk,sc-sc_tk, 15, -sc/2+sc_tk,sc-sc_tk, 15, -sc/2+sc_tk,sc_tk, 15, -vsc/2,sc_tk, 15, -vsc/2,0, 15, -sc/2,0, -1
del 4
lb_sc=2*(a+0.02)/3 !!!schiene length
addy b+vsh addx -lb/2+lb_b-lb_sc addz ras_s/2 roty 90
prism_ 13, lb_sc, -sc/2,0, 15, -sc/2,sc, 15, sc/2,sc, 15, sc/2,0, 15, vsc/2,0, 15, vsc/2,sc_tk, 15, sc/2-sc_tk,sc_tk, 15, sc/2-sc_tk,sc-sc_tk, 15, -sc/2+sc_tk,sc-sc_tk, 15, -sc/2+sc_tk,sc_tk, 15, -vsc/2,sc_tk, 15, -vsc/2,0, 15, -sc/2,0, -1
del 4
return
!************** coors for textures *********** !*********************************************
100:
rotz 90 vert 0, 0, 0 vert 0.1, 0, 0 vert 0, 0.1, 0 vert 0, 0, 0.1 del 1
coor 2, -1, -2, -3, -4
base
body -1
return
200:
vert 0, 0, 0 vert 0.1, 0, 0 vert 0, 0.1, 0 vert 0, 0, 0.1
coor 2, -1, -2, -3, -4
base
body -1
return
!******************************************************* !************************************ Section, elevation !*******************************************************
1000:
if GLOB_SCALE<100 then scale3=50 else scale3=100 endif
if det_sa = 100 then scale3=100 if det_sa = 50 then scale3=50
1001:
!********************* Fenster
! if e~=1 then ! mulz -1 ! addz -f~ ! endif
if scale3=100 then
gosub 3000
endif
if scale3=50 then
gosub 3000
addz ras_s gosub 3000 del 1
gosub 2000
for i=1 to 2
addy b gosub 2000 del 1
addy b+vsh gosub 2000 del 1
addy b+vsh+sc gosub 2000 del 1
addz ras_s
next i
del 2
endif
! if e~=1 then ! del 2 ! endif
end
2000:
pen gs_sc_pen
prism_ 5,ras_s, -lb/2, 0, 15, -lb/2, 0.0001, 15, lb/2, 0.0001, 15, lb/2, 0, 15, -lb/2, 0, -1
return
3000:
!************************ Window polygons
pen gs_sc_pen
!************************ schiene
lb_sc2=a+0.02 !!!schiene length lb_sc=2*(a+0.02)/3 !!!schiene length
lb_b=(a+0.02+2*(a+0.02)/3)-0.02
if iLayoutType = LAYOUT_LEFT_TOP or iLayoutType = LAYOUT_LEFT_BOT then mulx-1
if iLayoutType = LAYOUT_RIGHT_TOP or iLayoutType = LAYOUT_LEFT_TOP then addz ras_s+0.02 endif
addy b+vsh addx (lb_sc-lb)/2
prism_ 5, 0.0001, -lb_sc/2, 0, 15, -lb_sc/2, sc, 15, lb_sc/2, sc, 15, lb_sc/2, 0, 15, -lb_sc/2, 0, -1
del 1
addx lb_b-(lb_sc+lb)/2
prism_ 5, 0.0001, -lb_sc/2, 0, 15, -lb_sc/2, sc, 15, lb_sc/2, sc, 15, lb_sc/2, 0, 15, -lb_sc/2, 0, -1
del 1 del 1
if iLayoutType = LAYOUT_RIGHT_TOP or iLayoutType = LAYOUT_LEFT_TOP then del 1
if iLayoutType = LAYOUT_RIGHT_BOT or iLayoutType = LAYOUT_LEFT_BOT then addz ras_s+0.02 endif
addy b+vsh addx (lb_sc2-lb)/2
prism_ 5, 0.0001, -lb_sc2/2, 0, 15, -lb_sc2/2, sc, 15, lb_sc2/2, sc, 15, lb_sc2/2, 0, 15, -lb_sc2/2, 0, -1
del 2
if iLayoutType = LAYOUT_RIGHT_BOT or iLayoutType = LAYOUT_LEFT_BOT then del 1
if iLayoutType = LAYOUT_LEFT_TOP or iLayoutType = LAYOUT_LEFT_BOT then del 1
!************************ rahmen
if iLayoutType = LAYOUT_RIGHT_TOP then
lb_sc=a+0.02 !!!schiene length
addx ((a+0.02)-(a+0.08)/3)*(offladen/100)
if loc_type=4 then gosub 3010 if loc_type=1 then gosub 3020 if loc_type=3 then gosub 3030 if loc_type=2 then gosub 3020 if loc_type=5 then gosub 3010
del 1
addx ((2*(a+0.02)/3)-(a+0.08)/3)*(offladen/100) addz ras_s+0.02 ! addz 0.0001
if loc_type=4 then gosub 3010 if loc_type=1 then gosub 3020 if loc_type=3 then gosub 3030 if loc_type=2 then gosub 3020 if loc_type=5 then gosub 3010
del 2
addx -((2*(a+0.02)/3)-(a+0.08)/3)*(offladen/100) addz ras_s+0.02 ! addz 0.0001
addx lb_b/2-lb/2 mulx -1 addx -(lb_b/2-lb/2)
if loc_type=4 then gosub 3010 if loc_type=1 then gosub 3020 if loc_type=3 then gosub 3030 if loc_type=2 then gosub 3020 if loc_type=5 then gosub 3010
del 3
del 2
endif
if iLayoutType = LAYOUT_RIGHT_BOT then
lb_sc=a+0.02 !!!schiene length
addx ((a+0.02)-(a+0.08)/3)*(offladen/100) addz ras_s+0.02 ! addz 0.0001
if loc_type=4 then gosub 3010 if loc_type=1 then gosub 3020 if loc_type=3 then gosub 3030 if loc_type=2 then gosub 3020 if loc_type=5 then gosub 3010
del 2
addx ((2*(a+0.02)/3)-(a+0.08)/3)*(offladen/100)
if loc_type=4 then gosub 3010 if loc_type=1 then gosub 3020 if loc_type=3 then gosub 3030 if loc_type=2 then gosub 3020 if loc_type=5 then gosub 3010
del 1
addx -((2*(a+0.02)/3)-(a+0.08)/3)*(offladen/100)
addx lb_b/2-lb/2 mulx -1 addx -(lb_b/2-lb/2)
if loc_type=4 then gosub 3010 if loc_type=1 then gosub 3020 if loc_type=3 then gosub 3030 if loc_type=2 then gosub 3020 if loc_type=5 then gosub 3010
del 3
del 1
endif
if iLayoutType = LAYOUT_LEFT_TOP then
lb_sc=a+0.02 !!!schiene length
mulx -1
addx ((a+0.02)-(a+0.08)/3)*(offladen/100)
if loc_type=4 then gosub 3010 if loc_type=1 then gosub 3020 if loc_type=3 then gosub 3030 if loc_type=2 then gosub 3020 if loc_type=5 then gosub 3010
del 1
addx ((2*(a+0.02)/3)-(a+0.08)/3)*(offladen/100) addz ras_s+0.02 ! addz 0.0001
if loc_type=4 then gosub 3010 if loc_type=1 then gosub 3020 if loc_type=3 then gosub 3030 if loc_type=2 then gosub 3020 if loc_type=5 then gosub 3010
del 2
addx -((2*(a+0.02)/3)-(a+0.08)/3)*(offladen/100) addz ras_s+0.02 ! addz 0.0001
addx lb_b/2-lb/2 mulx -1 addx -(lb_b/2-lb/2)
if loc_type=4 then gosub 3010 if loc_type=1 then gosub 3020 if loc_type=3 then gosub 3030 if loc_type=2 then gosub 3020 if loc_type=5 then gosub 3010
del 3
del 2
del 1
endif
if iLayoutType = LAYOUT_LEFT_BOT then
lb_sc=a+0.02 !!!schiene length
mulx -1
addx ((2*(a+0.02)/3)-(a+0.08)/3)*(offladen/100)
if loc_type=4 then gosub 3010 if loc_type=1 then gosub 3020 if loc_type=3 then gosub 3030 if loc_type=2 then gosub 3020 if loc_type=5 then gosub 3010
del 1
addx ((a+0.02)-(a+0.08)/3)*(offladen/100) addz ras_s+0.02 ! addz 0.0001
if loc_type=4 then gosub 3010 if loc_type=1 then gosub 3020 if loc_type=3 then gosub 3030 if loc_type=2 then gosub 3020 if loc_type=5 then gosub 3010
del 2
addx -((2*(a+0.02)/3)-(a+0.08)/3)*(offladen/100)
addx lb_b/2-lb/2 mulx -1 addx -(lb_b/2-lb/2)
if loc_type=4 then gosub 3010 if loc_type=1 then gosub 3020 if loc_type=3 then gosub 3030 if loc_type=2 then gosub 3020 if loc_type=5 then gosub 3010
del 3
del 1
del 1
endif
RETURN
3010:
!!!********** type="Gelocht" or type="Vollflachig" then
prism_ 5, 0.0001, -lb/2, 0, 15, -lb/2, b, 15, lb/2, b, 15, lb/2, 0, 15, -lb/2, 0, -1
return
3020:
!!!********** type="Lamellen_fest" or type="Lamellen_beweglich" then
prism_ 5, 0.0001, -lb/2, 0, 15, -lb/2, b, 15, lb/2, b, 15, lb/2, 0, 15, -lb/2, 0, -1
b1=b hlb=0.08
nn=int(b1/hlb) if (nn+1)-b1/hlb<0.5 then nn=nn+1 hlb=b1/nn
addz 0.0001
for i=1 to nn
lin_ -lb/2, 0, 0, lb/2, 0, 0
addy hlb
next i
del nn+1
return
3030:
!!!********** type="Rahmen" then
prism_ 5, 0.0001, -lb/2, 0, 15, -lb/2, b, 15, lb/2, b, 15, lb/2, 0, 15, -lb/2, 0, -1
addx -(lb-2*rab_s)/2 addy rab_s addz 0.0001 rect lb-2*rab_s,b-2*rab_s del 3
return
Symbol.Script_2D:
if sym2=0 then end
!!!!!!!!!!**********parameters
pen gs_sc_pen line_type ltyp
dyl=0.02 !!!!laden/laden min 0.02 lb=(a+0.08)/3
if bShowAddHotspots then hotspot2 -a/2, 0, 10250 hotspot2 a/2, 0, 10251 endif
if lod2D = DET2D_FS_SIMPLE_ONE then goto 1100 if lod2D = DET2D_FS_SIMPLE_TWO | lod2D = DET2D_FS_MIDDLE then goto 1050 if lod2D = DET2D_FS_DETAILED then goto 1020
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! scale 1:100 ! -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
if GLOB_SCALE>=100 then
1100:
mul2 -1,1 add2 ((a+0.02)-(a+0.08)/3)*(offladen/100),0
line2 -a/2+0.02, 0, -a/2+0.02-lb, 0
if bShowAddHotspots then hotspot2 -a/2+0.02, 0, 10210 hotspot2 -a/2+0.02-lb, 0, 10211 endif
del 1
add2 ((2*(a+0.02)/3)-(a+0.08)/3)*(offladen/100),0
line2 -a/2+0.02, ras_s+dyl, -a/2+0.02-lb, ras_s+dyl
if bShowAddHotspots then hotspot2 -a/2+0.02, ras_s+dyl, 10202 hotspot2 -a/2+0.02-lb, ras_s+dyl, 10203 endif
del 1
add2 -((2*(a+0.02)/3)-(a+0.08)/3)*(offladen/100),0 mul2 -1,1
line2 -a/2+0.02, ras_s+dyl, -a/2+0.02-lb, ras_s+dyl
if bShowAddHotspots then hotspot2 -a/2+0.02-lb, ras_s+dyl, 10202 hotspot2 -a/2+0.02, ras_s+dyl, 10203 endif
del 3
end
endif
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! scale 1:50 ! -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
if GLOB_SCALE>=50 then
1050:
mul2 -1,1 add2 ((2*(a+0.02)/3)-(a+0.08)/3)*(offladen/100),0
rect2 -a/2+0.02, ras_s+dyl, -a/2+0.02-lb, 2*ras_s+dyl
if bShowAddHotspots then hotspot2 -a/2+0.02, ras_s+ras_s+dyl, 10204 hotspot2 -a/2+0.02-lb, ras_s+ras_s+dyl, 10205 hotspot2 -a/2+0.02, 0+ras_s+dyl, 10206 hotspot2 -a/2+0.02-lb, 0+ras_s+dyl, 10207 endif
del 1
add2 ((a+0.02)-(a+0.08)/3)*(offladen/100),0
rect2 -a/2+0.02, 0, -a/2+0.02-lb, ras_s
if bShowAddHotspots then hotspot2 -a/2+0.02, ras_s, 10211 hotspot2 -a/2+0.02-lb, ras_s, 10213 hotspot2 -a/2+0.02, 0, 10215 hotspot2 -a/2+0.02-lb, 0, 10217 endif
del 1
mul2 -1,1 add2 ((2*(a+0.02)/3)-(a+0.08)/3)*(offladen/100),ras_s+dyl
rect2 -a/2+0.02, 0, -a/2+0.02-lb, ras_s
if bShowAddHotspots then hotspot2 -a/2+0.02-lb, ras_s, 10200 hotspot2 -a/2+0.02, ras_s, 10201 hotspot2 -a/2+0.02-lb, 0, 10202 hotspot2 -a/2+0.02, 0, 10203 endif
del 3
end
endif
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! scale 1:20 ! -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
if GLOB_SCALE<50 then
1020:
! --- Type 4 --------------------------------------------------------------
if loc_type = 4 then
gps=0.003 !!!gelocht starke
mul2 -1,1 add2 ((a+0.02)-(a+0.08)/3)*(offladen/100),0 mul2 1,-1 add2 0,-ras_s
line2 -a/2+0.02, ras_s, -a/2+0.02-lb, ras_s line2 -a/2+0.02, ras_s,-a/2+0.02, ras_s-gps line2 -a/2+0.02-lb, ras_s,-a/2+0.02-lb, ras_s-gps line2 -a/2+0.02-rab_s, 0,-a/2+0.02-rab_s, ras_s-gps line2 -a/2+0.02-lb+rab_s, 0,-a/2+0.02-lb+rab_s, ras_s-gps
rect2 -a/2+0.02, 0, -a/2+0.02-lb, ras_s-gps
if bShowAddHotspots then hotspot2 -a/2+0.02, 0, 10208 hotspot2 -a/2+0.02-lb, 0, 10209 hotspot2 -a/2+0.02, ras_s, 10210 hotspot2 -a/2+0.02-lb, ras_s, 10211 endif
del 3
add2 ((2*(a+0.02)/3)-(a+0.08)/3)*(offladen/100),ras_s+dyl mul2 1,-1 add2 0,-ras_s
line2 -a/2+0.02, ras_s, -a/2+0.02-lb, ras_s line2 -a/2+0.02, ras_s,-a/2+0.02, ras_s-gps line2 -a/2+0.02-lb, ras_s,-a/2+0.02-lb, ras_s-gps line2 -a/2+0.02-rab_s, 0,-a/2+0.02-rab_s, ras_s-gps line2 -a/2+0.02-lb+rab_s, 0,-a/2+0.02-lb+rab_s, ras_s-gps
rect2 -a/2+0.02, 0, -a/2+0.02-lb, ras_s-gps
if bShowAddHotspots then hotspot2 -a/2+0.02, 0, 10204 hotspot2 -a/2+0.02-lb, 0, 10205 hotspot2 -a/2+0.02, ras_s, 10206 hotspot2 -a/2+0.02-lb, ras_s, 10207 endif
del 3
mul2 -1,1 add2 ((2*(a+0.02)/3)-(a+0.08)/3)*(offladen/100),ras_s+dyl mul2 1,-1 add2 0,-ras_s
line2 -a/2+0.02, ras_s, -a/2+0.02-lb, ras_s line2 -a/2+0.02, ras_s,-a/2+0.02, ras_s-gps line2 -a/2+0.02-lb, ras_s,-a/2+0.02-lb, ras_s-gps line2 -a/2+0.02-rab_s, 0,-a/2+0.02-rab_s, ras_s-gps line2 -a/2+0.02-lb+rab_s, 0,-a/2+0.02-lb+rab_s, ras_s-gps
rect2 -a/2+0.02, 0, -a/2+0.02-lb, ras_s-gps
if bShowAddHotspots then hotspot2 -a/2+0.02, 0, 10200 hotspot2 -a/2+0.02-lb, 0, 10201 hotspot2 -a/2+0.02, ras_s, 10202 hotspot2 -a/2+0.02-lb, ras_s, 10203 endif
del 5
endif
! --- Type 1, Type 3 ------------------------------------------------------
if loc_type = 1 or loc_type = 3 then
pab=0.01 !***panel anlagern las_s=ras_s/3 pas_s=ras_s/3
if loc_type=1 then ls_s=las_s if loc_type=1 then ls_s=pas_s
mul2 -1,1 add2 ((a+0.02)-(a+0.08)/3)*(offladen/100),0
if loc_type=3 then line2 -a/2+0.02-lb+rab_s-pab,ras_s/2,-a/2+0.02-rab_s+pab,ras_s/2 endif
line2 -a/2+0.02-rab_s, ras_s,-a/2+0.02-rab_s, ras_s/2+ls_s/2 line2 -a/2+0.02-rab_s, 0,-a/2+0.02-rab_s, ras_s/2-ls_s/2 line2 -a/2+0.02-lb+rab_s, 0,-a/2+0.02-lb+rab_s, ras_s/2-ls_s/2 line2 -a/2+0.02-lb+rab_s, ras_s,-a/2+0.02-lb+rab_s, ras_s/2+ls_s/2
rect2 -a/2+0.02-lb+rab_s-pab,ras_s/2-ls_s/2,-a/2+0.02-rab_s+pab,ras_s/2+ls_s/2 rect2 -a/2+0.02, 0, -a/2+0.02-lb, ras_s
if bShowAddHotspots then hotspot2 -a/2+0.02, ras_s, 10208 hotspot2 -a/2+0.02-lb, ras_s, 10209 hotspot2 -a/2+0.02, 0, 10210 hotspot2 -a/2+0.02-lb, 0, 10211 endif
del 1
add2 ((2*(a+0.02)/3)-(a+0.08)/3)*(offladen/100),ras_s+gps+dyl
if loc_type=3 then line2 -a/2+0.02-lb+rab_s-pab,ras_s/2,-a/2+0.02-rab_s+pab,ras_s/2 endif
line2 -a/2+0.02-rab_s, ras_s,-a/2+0.02-rab_s, ras_s/2+ls_s/2 line2 -a/2+0.02-rab_s, 0,-a/2+0.02-rab_s, ras_s/2-ls_s/2 line2 -a/2+0.02-lb+rab_s, 0,-a/2+0.02-lb+rab_s, ras_s/2-ls_s/2 line2 -a/2+0.02-lb+rab_s, ras_s,-a/2+0.02-lb+rab_s, ras_s/2+ls_s/2
rect2 -a/2+0.02-lb+rab_s-pab,ras_s/2-ls_s/2,-a/2+0.02-rab_s+pab,ras_s/2+ls_s/2 rect2 -a/2+0.02, 0, -a/2+0.02-lb, ras_s
if bShowAddHotspots then hotspot2 -a/2+0.02, ras_s, 10204 hotspot2 -a/2+0.02-lb, ras_s, 10205 hotspot2 -a/2+0.02, 0, 10206 hotspot2 -a/2+0.02-lb, 0, 10207 endif
del 1
mul2 -1,1 add2 ((2*(a+0.02)/3)-(a+0.08)/3)*(offladen/100),ras_s+gps+dyl
if loc_type=3 then line2 -a/2+0.02-lb+rab_s-pab,ras_s/2,-a/2+0.02-rab_s+pab,ras_s/2 endif
line2 -a/2+0.02-rab_s, ras_s,-a/2+0.02-rab_s, ras_s/2+ls_s/2 line2 -a/2+0.02-rab_s, 0,-a/2+0.02-rab_s, ras_s/2-ls_s/2 line2 -a/2+0.02-lb+rab_s, 0,-a/2+0.02-lb+rab_s, ras_s/2-ls_s/2 line2 -a/2+0.02-lb+rab_s, ras_s,-a/2+0.02-lb+rab_s, ras_s/2+ls_s/2
rect2 -a/2+0.02-lb+rab_s-pab,ras_s/2-ls_s/2,-a/2+0.02-rab_s+pab,ras_s/2+ls_s/2 rect2 -a/2+0.02, 0, -a/2+0.02-lb, ras_s
if bShowAddHotspots then hotspot2 -a/2+0.02, ras_s, 10200 hotspot2 -a/2+0.02-lb, ras_s, 10201 hotspot2 -a/2+0.02, 0, 10202 hotspot2 -a/2+0.02-lb, 0, 10203 endif
del 3
endif
! --- Type 2, Type 5 ------------------------------------------------------
if loc_type = 2 | loc_type = 5 then
if loc_type=2 then lab_s=ras_s/6 ls_s=lab_s*3 !!!*3- specification endif
mul2 -1,1 add2 ((a+0.02)-(a+0.08)/3)*(offladen/100),0
if loc_type=2 then line2 -a/2+0.02-rab_s, ras_s,-a/2+0.02-rab_s, ras_s/2+ls_s/2 line2 -a/2+0.02-rab_s, 0,-a/2+0.02-rab_s, ras_s/2-ls_s/2 line2 -a/2+0.02-lb+rab_s, 0,-a/2+0.02-lb+rab_s, ras_s/2-ls_s/2 line2 -a/2+0.02-lb+rab_s, ras_s,-a/2+0.02-lb+rab_s, ras_s/2+ls_s/2 endif rect2 -a/2+0.02, 0, -a/2+0.02-lb, ras_s if loc_type=2 then rect2 -a/2+0.02-lb+rab_s-pab,ras_s/2-ls_s/2,-a/2+0.02-rab_s+pab,ras_s/2+ls_s/2 endif
if bShowAddHotspots then hotspot2 -a/2+0.02, ras_s, 10208 hotspot2 -a/2+0.02-lb, ras_s, 10209 hotspot2 -a/2+0.02, 0, 10210 hotspot2 -a/2+0.02-lb, 0, 10211 endif
del 1
add2 ((2*(a+0.02)/3)-(a+0.08)/3)*(offladen/100),ras_s+gps+dyl
if loc_type=2 then line2 -a/2+0.02-rab_s, ras_s,-a/2+0.02-rab_s, ras_s/2+ls_s/2 line2 -a/2+0.02-rab_s, 0,-a/2+0.02-rab_s, ras_s/2-ls_s/2 line2 -a/2+0.02-lb+rab_s, 0,-a/2+0.02-lb+rab_s, ras_s/2-ls_s/2 line2 -a/2+0.02-lb+rab_s, ras_s,-a/2+0.02-lb+rab_s, ras_s/2+ls_s/2 endif rect2 -a/2+0.02, 0, -a/2+0.02-lb, ras_s if loc_type=2 then rect2 -a/2+0.02-lb+rab_s-pab,ras_s/2-ls_s/2,-a/2+0.02-rab_s+pab,ras_s/2+ls_s/2 endif
if bShowAddHotspots then hotspot2 -a/2+0.02, ras_s, 10204 hotspot2 -a/2+0.02-lb, ras_s, 10205 hotspot2 -a/2+0.02, 0, 10206 hotspot2 -a/2+0.02-lb, 0, 10207 endif
del 1
mul2 -1,1 add2 ((2*(a+0.02)/3)-(a+0.08)/3)*(offladen/100),ras_s+gps+dyl
if loc_type=2 then line2 -a/2+0.02-rab_s, ras_s,-a/2+0.02-rab_s, ras_s/2+ls_s/2 line2 -a/2+0.02-rab_s, 0,-a/2+0.02-rab_s, ras_s/2-ls_s/2 line2 -a/2+0.02-lb+rab_s, 0,-a/2+0.02-lb+rab_s, ras_s/2-ls_s/2 line2 -a/2+0.02-lb+rab_s, ras_s,-a/2+0.02-lb+rab_s, ras_s/2+ls_s/2 endif rect2 -a/2+0.02, 0, -a/2+0.02-lb, ras_s if loc_type=2 then rect2 -a/2+0.02-lb+rab_s-pab,ras_s/2-ls_s/2,-a/2+0.02-rab_s+pab,ras_s/2+ls_s/2 endif
if bShowAddHotspots then hotspot2 -a/2+0.02, ras_s, 10200 hotspot2 -a/2+0.02-lb, ras_s, 10201 hotspot2 -a/2+0.02, 0, 10202 hotspot2 -a/2+0.02-lb, 0, 10203 endif
del 3
endif
end
endif
Symbol.Script_1D:
! const values for parameter: iLayoutType LAYOUT_LEFT_TOP = 1 LAYOUT_LEFT_BOT = 2 LAYOUT_RIGHT_TOP = 3 LAYOUT_RIGHT_BOT = 4 LAYOUT_DOUBLE = 5
EPS=0.00001
! lod2d DET2D_FS_OFF = 0 DET2D_FS_SCALESENS = -1 DET2D_FS_SIMPLE_ONE = 11 DET2D_FS_SIMPLE_TWO = 12 DET2D_FS_MIDDLE = 21 DET2D_FS_MIDDLE_USA = 22 DET2D_FS_DETAILED = 30 DET2D_FS_DETAILED_FIX_GRID = 31 DET2D_FS_DETAILED_USA = 32 DET2D_FS_SIMPLE_CHI = 51 DET2D_FS_DETAILED_CHI = 52
lh=b lb=(a+0.08)/3
Symbol.Script_VL:
values "loc_type" 1,2,3,4,5
!values "det_3" "Komplett", "Abstrakt"
values{2} "iLayoutType" LAYOUT_RIGHT_TOP, `Справа Вверху`, LAYOUT_RIGHT_BOT, `Справа Внизу`, LAYOUT_LEFT_TOP, `Слева Вверху`, LAYOUT_LEFT_BOT, `Слева Внизу`

Boolean.Name: AC_HoleMaterialCurved
Boolean.Description: "Hole Surface's Split is Curved in Curved Walls"
